meanings.definition: Used as an intensifier to express annoyance or frustration.
meanings.sent1: Darned! I forgot my lunch again.
meanings.sent2: Oh, that darned traffic made me late for work.
meanings.sent3: Well, darned if I didn't spill coffee on my shirt.
meanings.sent4: The darned rain ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent5: I can't believe the darned printer jammed again.

meanings.definition: Mended with a series of small stitches.
meanings.sent1: She wore her favorite darned sweater to stay warm.
meanings.sent2: The darned sock kept her toes cozy in the cold weather.
meanings.sent3: His darned jeans had a unique patchwork design.
meanings.sent4: The darned quilt was a cherished family heirloom.
meanings.sent5: The darned pillow had a cute embroidered pattern.
